content: Lomborg is not a climate denier or skeptic, but he has alternative views on what humanity’s response to climate change should be. Romm is doing a disservice to people interested in the ‘big picture’ solutions to the climate change problems facing the world by nit-picking a couple of Lomborg’s errors. Best for people to make their own mind up and actually read the results of the Copenhagen Consensus and Lomborg’s more recent articles.
